tasks.description: HA custom component with MQTT auto-discovery. Sensors for battery, tanks, temps. config_flow for device IP + MQTT broker.

tasks.title: RV-C Bridge: BOM pricing & sourcing
tasks.description: Price all components. Target BOM < $60. Get quotes for 100-unit run from Mouser/DigiKey.
